summary: Completed comprehensive testing of loan application website. All backend APIs and frontend functionality working perfectly with 100% success rate.
passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero section and features
Multi-step form Step 1: Personal Info (first name, last name, email, phone, DOB)
Multi-step form Step 2: Address Info (street, city, state, zip)
Multi-step form Step 3: Financial Info (income, employment, loan amount, SSN)
Form validation for all required fields
Success page displays with application ID
